text: Plamen Vasilev Oresharski (; born 21 February 1960) is a Bulgarian politician. He was the Prime Minister of Bulgaria from May 29, 2013 to August 6, 2014. He was Minister of Finance from 2005 to 2009 in the Cabinet of the Triple Coalition with Prime Minister Sergei Stanishev. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Government ministers Category:Prime Ministers of Bulgaria
title: Plamen Oresharski
